changelog: FIXED: Video fullscreen mode now properly uses monitor coordinates (no more cut-off videos)
FIXED: Screenshot black screens on non-primary monitors using MSS library for negative coordinates
FIXED: Highlighter default opacity now starts at 35% (semi-transparent) instead of 100%
FIXED: Undo button now properly clears and reloads annotations
FIXED: Edge-tts error messages now show actual errors instead of 'not installed'
IMPROVED: Toast notification shows which step was updated after annotation save
ADDED: MSS library support for better multi-monitor screenshot handling
